ubicacion1: Milan Cathedral is a Gothic cathedral located in the city of the same name.

ubicacion2: Located in the Piazza del Duomo in Pisa, in the city of the same name, a municipality in the Italian region of Tuscany and capital of the province of the same name in Italy.

ubicacion3: It is an amphitheater from the time of the Roman Empire, built in the 1st century. It is located in the east of the Roman Forum and was the largest of those built in the Roman Empire

ubicacion4: It is an architectural complex located in the María Luisa Park in the city of Seville (Andalusia, Spain). It was built between 1914 and 1929 and is the largest building of the Ibero-American Exposition of 1929.

ubicacion5: It is an exceptional temple, both in terms of its origin and foundation, as well as its purpose. Today, more than 140 years after the laying of the first stone, the Basilica is still under construction.

ubicacion6: It is one of the most beautiful and best-preserved in Europe. Its more than 135,000 square meters have witnessed centuries of Spanish history.

ubicacion7: Located at the end of the Champ de Mars on the banks of the Seine River, a symbol of France and its capital, it is the tallest structure in the city and the most visited tourist attraction in the world.

ubicacion8: It is the national museum of France dedicated to fine arts, archaeology, and decorative arts prior to Impressionism.

ubicacion9: Es una catedral de culto católico, sede de la arquidiócesis de París, la capital de Francia.
